title: Assessing the efficacy of aluminum metal clusters Al13 and Al15 in mitigating NO2 and SO2 pollutants: a DFT investigation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11217-11231
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00708E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sajida Riffat Laraib, Ji Liu, Yuan-gu Xia, Yang-wen Wu, Mohsen Doust Mohammadi, Nayab Fatima Noor, Qiang Lu
The Al15 and Al13 exhibit excellent performance on NO2 and SO2 adsorption. The depiction explores critical points (3, −1) and the interatomic relationships between Al13 and NO2.
